property.name: Text
property.value: Response: After Hirgon quests successfully, play a Ï ally from your hand and reduce the cost to play it by 1 (to a minimum of 1). Then, you may raise your threat by 1 to give that ally +1 Û and +1 Ú until the end of the round.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Attach to a Harad character.
Attached character gets +1 Û. Response: After attached character is declared as an attacker, it gets +3 Û for this attack. After this attack resolves, discard Haradrim Spear.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Play only if you control a unique character with the Warrior trait and another unique character with the Scout trait.
Response: After the players have committed characters to the quest, discard a non-unique enemy in the staging area. Then, reveal an encounter card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 per deck. Attach to a Gondor hero. Attached hero gets +1 Ò. Valour Response: After attached hero quests successfully, add The Red Arrow to the victory display to search the top 5 cards of your deck for an ally and put it into play.

property.name: Text
property.value: Limit 1 copy of Keep Watch in the victory display. While this side quest is in the victory display, each non-unique enemy engaged with a player gets -1 Û.

property.name: Text
property.value: While a side quest is in the victory display, Rider of Rohan ally does not exhaust to quest.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a Hobbit hero. Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero gets +1 Ò for each Song attachment attached to it.

property.name: Text
property.value: Response: Discard Dunedain Lookout to cancel the ‘when revealed’ effects on an enemy just revealed from the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Attach to a hero. Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero gains the Ranger trait. Response: After you play Doughty Ranger from your hand, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Play only if the characters you control have a total of at least 9 different Traits among them. Action: Ready each character in play. Until the end of the phase, each character you control gets +1 Ò.

property.name: Text
property.value: Cannot have attachments. Cannot take damage. Brood Mother engages the first player. Forced: At the end of the round, search the encounter deck and discard pile for a Spider Broodling and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: While On Track is in play, Hive Guardian gets +2 Û and -5 engagement cost.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if On Track is in play).

property.name: Text
property.value: While On Track is in play, Spider Broodling gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If On Track is in play, put Spider Broodling into play engaged with you and deal it a shadow card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Immune to player card effects. Forced: After Spider Burrow becomes the active location, flip the Search objective to On Track and add Brood Mother to the staging area. Forced: When Spider Burrow leaves play as an explored location, set Brood Mother aside, out of play (unless the players are at stage 3B).

property.name: Text
property.value: X is the number of characters controlled by the first player. Travel: Reveal the top card of the encounter deck to travel here.

property.name: Text
property.value: Travel: Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until a Creature enemy is discarded. Add the discarded enemy to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: While On Track is in play, Cobwebbed Cavern gets +2 $.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Exhaust a character you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: While On Track is in play, progress cannot be placed on locations in the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard an attachment you control.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Either flip the Search objective to Off Track, or deal 1 damage to each questing character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If On Track is in play, attacking enemy makes an additional attack against you after this one.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to the main quest. Limit 1 per quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: “Forced: After the Search objective is flipped to Off Track, each player discards an ally he controls. Then, discard Grabbed by Spiders.”)

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Flip the Search objective to Off Track. While Lost Underground is in play, the Search objective cannot flip. (Do not resolve the Track keyword.) Response: When this stage is defeated, flip the Search objective to On Track and ignore its Forced effect until the end of the phase.

property.name: Text
property.value: Setup: Set Brood Mother aside, out of play. Add the Search objective to the staging area (Off Track face up).

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard cards from the encounter deck until X locations are discarded, where X is the number of players. Add each location discarded by this effect to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Flip the Search objective to Off Track. Shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top until X enemies are discarded, where X is the number of players. Add each enemy discarded by this effect to the staging area.

property.name: Text
property.value: While On Track is in play, encounter card effects cannot be canceled.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player adds Brood Mother to the staging area. Each other player reveals an encounter card. Flip the Search objective to Off Track.

property.name: Text
property.value: While there are at least 5 progress tokens on this stage, Brood Mother loses the text: “Cannot take damage.” Forced: After the Search objective is flipped to Off Track, remove all progress tokens from this stage. This stage cannot be defeated while Brood Mother is in play. If the players defeat this stage, they win the game.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, search the top 3 cards of the encounter deck for a card with On Track, add it to the staging area and discard the rest. If no card enters play from this effect, flip this objective.
Forced: After the players quest unsuccessfully, flip this objective.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, place 1 progress here. Then, either return the topmost location in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, or raise each player's threat by 1 for each resource here.
Progress cannot be placed on the main quest.
